content: have too many spare hooks and needles lying around your house then this simple case is what you need this pattern is beginner-friendy and only requires basic knowledge of crochet if you know how to slip_stitch single and double_crochet us terms then you know how to crochet this case you will need - 25-70 metres 28-77 yards of worsted weight yarn any fibre is fine as long as it s sturdy - 5 mm crochet hook - tapestry needle - a button - sewing needle and thread to sew the button - stitch markers optional but helpful the pattern includes a tutorial for the bobble stitch and three different sizes * crochet hook case * 25 cm/10 inches knitting needle case * 35 cm/14 inches knitting needle case if you have any questions or if you spot a mistake in the pattern please let me know in the meantime happy crocheting ***errata available*** for the 35 cm knitting needle case
